inbodydescription.para: Disables pwm force by default to prevent unintended force if the user has not configured pwm force.

briefdescription.para: select one trigger from 8, set to use input signal(selected by cnt_reload_trig) to reload timer
Multiple counters are enabled at the same time.

parameterdescription.para: bit0 - cnt0, bit1 - cnt1, bitn - cntn, n==3

briefdescription.para: The shadow registers can be updated only when related unlock_bit is set.

parameterdescription.para: bit2 to bit 29 for value_shadow, bit30 for force_mode, bit31 for polarity.

Disable trigmux to trigger counter initiation.
